Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: jwyly
Reviews.Content: We just returned from spending a night in this hotel. The rooms are as pictured, comfortable and clean. If you are looking for a hotel near the Boardwalk this isn't for you as it is 100 blocks north of the main area. We didn't need to be that close, and liked that this hotel is set back slightly from the street because it was quiet. A Dennys next door was convenient for breakfast and the two women who were the front desk reception when we arrived and left were extremely helpful and friendly. They tried very hard to make sure that we felt welcome and had a good stay. I would stay in this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Great value, wonderful staff”
Reviews.Author: eeogra
Reviews.Content: This hotel is great value for such a cheap price. My friends and I stayed at the comfort inn over the labor day weekend. Don't let the few negative reviews keep you from staying here. We found the room clean, comfortable and best of all - cheap. This isn't a beachfront establishment, but its quick walk across the street to access the beach. Avoid the Dennys next door, the lines are really not worth it, especially since the Fractured Prune (Unbelievable Donut Shop) is just down the street. Theres also an all-night bus that drives up and down coastal highway, so theres really no need to drive your car to the bars (Oh Seacrets....) One thing, be sure to bring bug spray because the sand flies bite.... hard. One note on the staff. For a hotel on the lower end of Ocean City, the staff here was incredibly welcoming and thoughtful. They were very attentive during check-in and provided several recommendations for food options in the area. Also, following a freak thunderstorm Saturday night, my friends and I finally made it to the hotel, cold, soaked, miserable and hungry. While looking at food options in the store next to the front desk, the night clerk brought out towels for us to wrap ourselves in without us even asking. It really helped to cheer us up!

Reviews.Title: “Strange smells”
Reviews.Author: juliebalt
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel 08/21-08/23. We had a hotel booked on the boardwalk 08/23-08/26, but decided last minute to come down early at the last minute and booked two nights here. The location is far from a lot of the main attractions, but the cost of the hotel is lower than average. The rooms were nice, however, when we walked in, there was a horrible overwhelming smell. I am not one to be picky but the smell was awful. I'm not even really sure what it was...possibly mildew. Whatever it was, it smelled bad. We went to the grocery store to buy some air freshener to get us through the next day. If we had booked more than a night or two, we would have asked to change rooms, although it sounds as though this may be a common problem. Other than the smell, the room itself was very nice. I always enjoy balconies at the beach, and did not get one at this hotel, but the room was okay for a night or two.

Reviews.Title: “A nice place”
Reviews.Author: askfirst
Reviews.Content: If you are not looking for an oceanfront hotel; this is the place for you. Most hotels in OC charge more just because they are located on the beach. This hotel is a lot less expensive. Althoygh it is quite far from the majority of activities, you can still get around on a all day bus that costs a nominal fee. Overall the hotel was a great place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Find another hotel”
Reviews.Author: Ricmar60
Reviews.Content: We just spent 3 days at this hotel. I will say that the location is great and the staff very nice and friendly, however, we were not very happy with the hotel. When we checked in, we found that our room had a bad smell. We talked to the front desk, and they said that they would have someone take care of it and that it would take an hour or two. The hotel did indicate that if we were unhappy with the efforts to remove the smell, they would give us another room. When we got back from dinner, the smell was still there , but we tolerated it because we had friends staying in the ajoining room. The bathroom was clean and acceptable, but the room just didn't feel clean. We won't be staying at this hotel again. It was priced OK, and I guess you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: “Don't let the bad reviews fool you”
Reviews.Author: love2travel0801
Reviews.Content: I'm a bit of a hotel snob... well maybe not SNOB.. but I am very finicky about the places I stay. After reading the reviews, I was a little weary about booking..but I did. I was pleasantly surprised by the young lady who answered the phone (Stacie), she was honest about all questions I asked. The hotel is GREAT for the price. My room (5th floor Bay View) was clean, the view was great (no foggy windows like someone reviewed), and with three 16 year old girls, there was enough room for us all. The location was great, not on the boardwalk- but a 3 minute walk across Coastal Hwy to the beach & the staff was more than accommodating, friendly and knowledgeable. My ONLY negative is that there was no breakfast...but in saying that.. there are a fridge and microwave in the room, so cereal and milk is an option, and the Rite Aid is next door.

Reviews.Title: “What a great stay for our Families!”
Reviews.Author: MrsT1020
Reviews.Content: My husband and I, along with his brother and wife stayed here recently and we thrilled with the place. The rooms were clean, spacious and quite nicely decorated. We found the location to be perfect since, none of us wanted to be on the boardwalk and around all that noise. We watched many spectacular bay sunsets from the little patio off the pool in the loungers. The four of us decided that when we come back to OC we will stay there again. They staff was efficient, friendly and extremely helpful, as well as accomodating. The quick jaunt to the beach was perfect. Thank you all so much for providing us with such an incredible stay!!

Reviews.Title: “Average accommodation”
Reviews.Author: cjajsmom
Reviews.Content: We seldom visit Ocean City "in season" but we needed to make a quick trip down and this was best price we could get anywhere using our Choice Hotels card. The front desk and staff -- Great folks! Friendly, helpful, efficient. Excellent first impression. The room -- Not so pleasing. A few pluses: The table lamps all had electrical outlets in the bases. I've never seen this before and consider it to be a great addition to any hotel room where there are never enough receptacles. Ample storage space for clothes. Fitted sheets. The negatives: Ground floor room 101 had a very uneven floor (assume it was concrete under the carpet). This could be very disorienting to someone with balance problems. Wall switches and receptacles were crooked, just sloppy workmanship. AC was either freezing or too warm. Room stayed humid the entire time, making sleeping very difficult. You were either cold and damp or warm and damp. Pillows were very uncomfortable. I would rather have had just two decent pillows than the five awful pillows provided. View of the bay was obstructed by the cloudy window. Had the potential to be a nice view. Door to the outside that was used by staff was right outside our room and was constantly being slammed during the afternoon. The mattress on the bed did not reach as far was the headboard. There was hair and other things below the headboard. A good cleaning is needed and the mattress needs to be lifted and moved back into the proper location. Pool-- There were a lot of people in the pool when we took a look at it. The water looked brownish and unappealing. On a positive note, there was an employee in the pool area, which is something I haven't seen very often. We did not use the pool. Dining -- Continental breakfast is NOT available here. However, there is a Denny's attached. Prices there are very reasonable, especially for a resort area. Access to beach and local restaurants and shops -- The walk to beach was not too long but you do have to cross the main highway. There were quite a few restaurants within easy walking distance. The Gold Coast Mall is right next to the Comfort Inn and includes a movie theater. Would we stay here again? Probably not.

Reviews.Title: “Nice 2 day trip to Ocean City, MD”
Reviews.Author: Lindsay0329
Reviews.Content: Used my rewards points to stay at the Comfort Inn Goldcoast. Nice hotel. Excellent views of the bay. Pool looked a little cloudy, however we didn't use it. This is a great hotel at the beach. Definitely served its purpose for us (family of three) which is a clean nice place to sleep and shower at. We came to the beach for the beach and had an excellent time. Would come back to this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Well worth the buck”
Reviews.Author: chrissycoolcat
Reviews.Content: My girlfriend and I came here this summer and stayed on the 5th floor.staff was nice, lobby was clean, ice machine worked on floor we stayed, didn't try others. Room was nice we got a king through choice priviledges. It wasn't spotless but it was clean enough for us. We got some lysol to spray around just to be safe. I would definitely come back cause it was such a good price and the hotel really is pretty good. We walked to the beach at night which wasn't that far, but not that close. Boardwalk was at least 15 min away if not more. Overall better than what I expected

Reviews.Title: “VERY DIRTY,BUT COULD BE GREAT!!!”
Reviews.Author: eagle2012
Reviews.Content: The hotel looks good, it has modern furniture,the room is not bad,size and appearance wise, but very dirty!!! Specially the bathroom,there was brown splashes on the jacuzzi,I had to call to have it cleaned,And the jacuzzi is in the powder room with the toilet. I had no desire to take a bath whatsoever... the windows you can barely see outside,the wall outlets come out of the wall when you try to take your charger out,the pull out couch is mad uncomfortable,I don't know how my kids are going to manage to sleep four nights on it...The hotel claims to be "recently remodeled".I think they just put some makeup on to hide lots of imperfections...the pool is small and the water is blurry and you can see the dirt on the bottom. Same thing with the hot tub...If they could improve the cleaning and some minor things this hotel could be a keeper,It has potential!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: MRBURKE
Reviews.Content: Great value for the location. Beach within an easy 2 block walk, next to a movie theater and small mall. Good restaurants within walking distance of the hotel. Did not use the pool area – to busy when we were there, plus we came for the beach. Staff was very friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Ok I guess”
Reviews.Author: CdnOsFan
Reviews.Content: We were not in the room much other than washing and sleeping so it was okay. We have not stayed at a Comfort Inn for many years so our expectations were not high. Several things were annoying: -Room was boiling hot, however maintenance came up right away. Had to replace air conditioning unit which took a few hours. It was done by the time we came back. -Ceiling/wall area over one of the beds had a very unsightly repair/patch job. -TV channel selection and picture quality on many channels was lousy -$2 for washer and $2 more for dryer a bit much and both nights we asked for quarters from the front desk and they didn't have any.... -Pool/hottub area are very unappealing (dumpy). -Check-in was very friendly. However, desk clerks were bickering behind front desk one night. Tonight they seemed very impatient with someone on the phone. Never greeted people when they walked by the front desk and seemed to not enjoy their jobs. -Dumb little square bed pillows. -Message on envelopes asking for tips for housekeepers seems a bit pushy. We tip usually but don't ask for it. Now for the positive: -Beds were comfy -Washroom was nice -Maid service seemed very thourough -Public beach access across street -Price was okay for expensive OC. If you need somewhere okay to stay and dont expect much more than a clean room, here you are. If you intend to spend a lot of time at the hotel, look around elsewhere. I will probably try somewhere else next time....

Reviews.Title: “We Love this place!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Vermille D
Reviews.Content: We have been coming here for many years! We were there doing the construction, and the staff was fabulous. We stayed during hotel week a couple years..... We won't stay any other place but the Comfort Inn Gold Coast.!!! Just love it, very peaceful. The cleaning staff was always friendly. I always leave the girls a tip..... I know they are exchange students from a diffrent countries...

Reviews.Title: “Expected less and got EXCELLENT service...”
Reviews.Author: gburg21
Reviews.Content: At first when I saw how far way it was from the night life I was a little thorwn off but when I entered everything was fixed. Nice front desk service. Loved the room, I never take off my shoes in hotels or shower with without sandels but this one seemed so new I did. New furniture and nice flat screen with HBO is a very nice touch. The second day at 3:45pm we were coming from the beach we came back to no light in the hotel for like 1 hr but the whole entire strip was off as well so we didn't mind. Never got to try the pool but im sure it is as nice. Great hotel

Reviews.Title: “OK hotel for the price”
Reviews.Author: 1980rebel
Reviews.Content: Stayed here with my 2 young kids and husband for 5 days. Pretty clean room but very small. Tight fit for the 4 of us. The front desk staff were very friendly and knowledgable. The pool seemed like it was under construction with pilons and boards screwed to the floor. Lots of sand in the pool! It is a beautiful view from the pool area of the bay. This hotel is a little way from the board walk, but a quick walk to the beach. Don't think we would stay here again, but more because the size of the room and location.

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel. Right off Coastal Highway”
Reviews.Author: Monamacduff
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel during the peak summer season. The hotel was kind of worn down but was clean and the staff was friendly. Our room was comfortable. It was kind of noisy at times because our room was only on the third floor and was overlooking a parking lot which was loud when people and kid were yelling outside. It is a 10-15 minute drive to the boardwalk but there are many restaurants nearby.

Reviews.Title: “Great property!”
Reviews.Author: Tis9804
Reviews.Content: Great hotel! I was in Ocean City with my family and really enjoyed staying at the Comfort inn. We stayed here four years ago and was really surprised with the renovations. The hotel was really clean and well managed.

Reviews.Title: “Run Down and Dirty Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Jenn6786
Reviews.Content: Stayed two nights. 3/30 and 4/1. Two of the women at the front desk were always pleasant but Bryan, the manager I believe, must have been absent from Hotel Mangagement(if he even went to college and majored in this) course on customer relations/professionalism because quite frankly..he had none. I complained about noise (not his fault I understand, because low lifes are what they are...) and was met with a "Well what do you want me to do about it?" I would have expected more of a professional response. That is all. The irony is that when I checked in he was quick to tell my children who are young teens to remember to keep it down after 9pm! I told him right then and there that my kids know better. Too bad some other parents with kids didn't. Apparently, many parents take these sport weekends that are suppose to be about their kids as an opportunity to drink and party well into the early morning hours. Low class and disturbing. I only expected the manager of this hotel to be empathetic to my compalint. That was not the case. The room was ok. I did find dirty tissues stuffed down back of mattress and hair that was not mine on the bed's under blanket. The pillows are tiny, lumpy pillows. Very uncomfortable. Toliet could have been cleaner. The pool? Disgusting. There is no other word for it. The location of the hotel is behind a run down strip mall. Not very pleasing to the eye when you pull in. I am sure there are much nicer hotels for the same price as this one along Costal Hwy. I would never, ever stay at this hotel again!!!!

Reviews.Title: “PLEASANT!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: jadael69
Reviews.Content: We were there for a 3 day cheer competition. The place was completely packed. We didn't get in until after 10pm and there was quite a line at the front desk. The staff was efficient and got the line down to nothing in no time flat. When we got to the clerk it was such a pleasant surprise to find such happy people helping us. We had asked in our online reservation for adjoining rooms and we were concerned that it wasn't going to happen because the place was so booked, but they were ready for us and had the adjoining room just like we requested. I had to go to the front desk a few times, not for major issues, just simple questions, and they were more than happy to help. It is sad that I found the pleasantness of the staff so alarming, but it is such a rare thing to find anymore and I just cannot say enough wonderful things about them. The beds were very comfortable. The bathrom was small, but the shower was strong (in other words the water didn't drip out of the shower head). If I had any complaint it would be the pool. It was not very clean, and the clorine smell was so strong it burned my eyes and my throat just sitting poolside watching my kids. I will definately go back!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: njbud
Reviews.Content: Quick check-in on a Saturday night for just an overnight stay while traveling. Hotel was full because of a large soccer group. Used my choice points for this stay good thing I reserved in advance via the Choice Hotels website. Assigned room 309 and found it very clean and updated. Small but nice bathroom. Flat screen TV 2 queen beds, desk and all furniture was in good condition. The internet connection was fast, very good no problems. The public areas were nice and clean. The desk staff was nice and friendly. There are ice machines across from the elevators on floors 2, 3, 4 and 5. Only the machine on floor 2 was working, the other 3 machines only made noise but no ice. Overall a nice Comfort Inn Hotel that I would have no problem visiting again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Stay”
Reviews.Author: Stephen H
Reviews.Content: Hotel was clean, comfortable & up to standards, far above "chain rating". Only downside was no free breakfast, but Denny's was attached (& with what I saved, paying for breakfast was not an issue. We had a convention in a neighboring hotel that was almost twice as much per night (those who stayed at that hotel met us at Denny's for breakfast so it worked out great). Did not use pool, but wi-fi worked as it should have.

Reviews.Title: “Nice renovated room”
Reviews.Author: Lucie S
Reviews.Content: Great clean room, friendly staff, beds too soft for me, pool smelled of chlorine. Will definitely come again

Reviews.Title: “GREAT FAMILY FUN HOTEL......”
Reviews.Author: nornette1977
Reviews.Content: clean clean, nice pool clean room great service clean hot tub

Reviews.Title: “Just ok”
Reviews.Author: 41378Mike
Reviews.Content: It served the purpose -- I was here on business but would definitely stay elsewhere if it were a pleasure trip. There are much nicer options up and down the street for around the same price.

Reviews.Title: “Family HS”
Reviews.Author: MoochGirl
Reviews.Content: I will never stay at this hotel. I would not recommend anyone to stay here. IT HAS BED BUGS!!!!! My boyfriend and our children planned to atay for the weekend. My boyfriend was woken up by a bed bug about to crawl on his face. When he went down stairs to complain, the staff treated him like he was less worthy off them. They laughed at him like he was a joke and said well you need to prove it to us that their was one on the bed. They also they asked him do you even know what a bed bug looks like?Really?They wanted us to switch to another room, but we were like if their is one in our room, there might be one in another room and we did not want to chance it. They treated our family like trash. They should have been more than accomidating. I was very disappointed at the pool as well. It was dirty and we watched the pool cleaning lady just sweep the dirt right back in the pool, that was our que to leave the pool area. It's a shame because it was in a great place. Right next to Denny's and a shopping center, but it was not so clean. DO NOT STAY THERE!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place for the Price”
Reviews.Author: beachgrrl22
Reviews.Content: We chose to stay bayside for the first time ever because it was a lot cheaper. This hotel was running a great special so we couldn't pass it up. The room was very nice. We had four girls staying and we had enough room for all of our stuff. The location is ok as long as you don't mind walking across the street to get to the beach and driving or taking the bus to get down to the boardwalk. It's got a 24-hr Denny's inside, a small fitness center and an indoor pool.

Reviews.Title: “Definitely would revisit this hotel”
Reviews.Author: LPG08
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical when booking this hotel because of the reviews, but once checked in my fears were gone. the staff was overly friendly when checking in. I stayed in the king suite which was very nicely sized and decent for the rate, and my floor was very quiet. The room was very clean equipped w/ a fridge & microwave (so convenient). The only complaint i have is, no continental breakfast but Denny's is connected to the hotel & is 24hrs. There is also a mini-mall thru the parking lot with restaurants & a movie theatre.

Reviews.Title: “Just what we needed!!!”
Reviews.Author: Dunmeyers
Reviews.Content: We had a great stay here the staff was friendly, are room was clean, and had great view of the bay! My only complaint was Denny's next door not that Comfort Inn can control it. But the amount of flies in that restaurant was just pure nasty. It was very difficult to enjoy the convienence of Denny's for its flies.....So try the House of Pancakes in 70s. Nice quick breakfast. Overall return to Comfort Inn, and order take out for breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Just what we need”
Reviews.Author: Denine J
Reviews.Content: Conveniently located. It was a quick getaway. Accessible to everything.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for a day visit to Ocean City, Md”
Reviews.Author: HunkyJoe
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Comfort Inn as a one night stop while traveling north on motorcycles. The desk clerks were very helpful, allowing us to check in early, and providing tips on getting around. They permitted us to park the motorcycles safely near the entrance of the hotel. The hotel is a large beach hotel across from the beach. A bus stop in front of the hotel provided us with easy and inexpensive ($1) ride to the boardwalk area of Ocean City. The hotel was clean considering the large turnover in guests. There is no breakfast included, so we had to eat at a Denny's a few doors away, There are other restaurants within walking distance. Although the hotel was the most expensive we stayed at during the trip, at $ 130, it was reasonable for Ocean City in June.

Reviews.Title: “ehhhh. . .”
Reviews.Author: alan831
Reviews.Content: ok if you have never stayed at a comfort inn before (and I hadn't) this is definitely a "motel". Good points- recently renovated, rates were good, check in was friendly, mostly families were staying there. Poor points- the air conditioner was loud and smelled musty- it was so bad we even turned it off and slept without it, Room was relatively clean but had some stains and wear and tear. The hotel is located in a strip mall and therefore you parked in a strip mall parking lot all night. Located right across the beach means a huge parking lot and six lane highway across to the boardwalk- we drove. Bottom Line: Ocean City has a spring break feel to it and this is motel is typical of what you will find there.

Reviews.Title: “Smelly, Noisy, Bad Service”
Reviews.Author: jdinger1960
Reviews.Content: Our room had an odor upon entering. It had this odor the whole time we were there.it smelled like an old man peed in the corner..take some Fabreeze! The room was on the first floor by a back exit door, that or the door to the other room (there are only 2 rooms in the hallway) were slamming late at night and early in the morning.It's also in the hallway by the gym , laundry and pool entrance.. i think the ppl next to us liked to hear their door slam as they ran back and forth to the pool.The walls are thin..we could here the other rooms tv the whole time..even when we were watching our tv. The room was not vacuumed very well if at all..peices of hair were left in the bathroom from the rag or the last guest..(ewww I hate that) . There was a paper towel with some food particles on it sticking to the wall on top of the microwave. It's up high and not easy to see..but I saw it and I bet it's still there. The outlets had big cavaties arount the outlet covers in the "newly renovated room" the windows are crappy and there is duct tape around the air conditioner.. We left the do not disturb sign on the door the first night so we could sleep in a bit.. We got up and went to the beach which is just across the street. We came back around 11:30 am on the way though the lobby I stopped and asked the front desh to send some towels. We got to the room and had a message that our room was not cleaned because of the do not disturb sign..which was fine...We went to the pool which was nice. We came back two hours later still no towels. I called the front desk again a man said we'll get them right to you..we used our beach towels after our showers and went out for the day..we got back at about 8 pm..you guessed it..still no towels..I called the front desk told them this was the third time I asked..they apologized and sent a lady with them right away. If you stay here take your own cleaning supplies and fabrezee. I'll be staying somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: “So-so”
Reviews.Author: suppressor86
Reviews.Content: Booked two rooms over the weekend in the Comfort Inn Gold Coast. Both rooms were pre-booked for five people with a rollaway. Since we had a big party, the rollaways were necessary. The first room was given a rollaway. However, the second room was told that the hotel was "overbooked" and rollaway beds would not be available. This is simply poor management by the hotel. Overall, the hotel was mediocre, but probably better than most in Ocean City (that's not saying much). If possible, don't book hotels in Ocean City. Go with a condo rental for better value.

Reviews.Title: “Nice updates, no complaints”
Reviews.Author: Bmc39
Reviews.Content: 5 of us ladies stayed for a girls weekend, so we didn't mind sharing beds. No early check-ins or late check-outs available. Nice, big, divided bathroom on the king suite. Beach access across the st. Plenty of parking. Rite aid, mall, & Greene Turtle w/in short walk. Bus stop right out front. Delaware very close = fewer people. Negatives: not enough lighting for a couple people to get ready at once. Don't expect to be able to wander & find things to do. It's mostly residential & hotels w/in walking distance.

Reviews.Title: “very impressed with cleanliness of property and helpfulness of staff”
Reviews.Author: katmomnewyork
Reviews.Content: priced much lower than hotels only 10 mins away...

Reviews.Title: “OK for the weekend - you get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: Travis41
Reviews.Content: Located on approximately 112th street. The hotel does not have much curb appeal, however, once inside the rooms are spacious and clean. You do have to navigate the main strip of road to get across to the beach, but there is a public access path directly across from the hotel. Can't say we spent a lot of time in the room. Hotels hallways were not noisy. Almost no ammenities to speak of - overall the cost of a hotel room in ocean city is outrageous. We requested an additional hour to check out on a Sunday morning - we were unceremoniously told NO! You get about what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: “"we loved it and we'll be back!"”
Reviews.Author: vacation046
Reviews.Content: Great clean hotel! Location can not be beat being directly across the street to ocean access. Hotel was just finished a complete renovation off all the rooms. All of the employees were extremely friendly and helpful. The price was great with AAA membership. The only down fall is that they don't give a continentinal breakfast. They have a Denny's on the property. The Denny's gets very busy and have to wait if arrive after 9 AM.

Reviews.Title: “Some Elbow Grease went a Long Way”
Reviews.Author: 9OverPar18
Reviews.Content: I have been staying at the Comfort Inn Gold Coast with some regularity for a few years, but this stay was worth writing home about (each stay has been 4 stars but this one was 5). They have put a serious amount of work, money and effort into this property and I am impressed. My room was just what I expected, the service was top notch and the pool area was great for a beachtown. I also appreciate that it is a bayside hotel but it can see the ocean it is so close. Get the lower prices that come with being away from the beach, but only a few minutes walk to the beach. I would definitely recommend this hotel if you are looking.

Reviews.Title: “Average hotel with some disappointments”
Reviews.Author: TNAustin
Reviews.Content: We are currently in the hotel and will be checking out in the morning. Room was not cleaned/dusted very well. Cobwebs in the lamp, stain on shower curtain, and long hair on sheets that are not mine. The room that we were given was by the rooftop and after coming out of the shower this afternoon, I seen a man walking right outside my window which was a little scary. The other disappointing thing is that the pool is not heated, as advertised. Will not stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Apparently newly renovated...Loved the service”
Reviews.Author: Amith_11
Reviews.Content: Awesome hotel... Walk-able to the beach....Friendly staff...Children/Family friendly..

Reviews.Title: “An oasis among chaos”
Reviews.Author: boardhead
Reviews.Content: We stayed here after friends party. OC is a madhouse, but this hotel is out of the action zone and set well back from the road. We had a peaceful, comfortable night. The $1 bus is a great way to get around in a town with little parking (the hotel lot is ample). Runs continuously 24 hrs.

Reviews.Title: “never stay here again”
Reviews.Author: Glorybutterfly
Reviews.Content: First of all, The hotel staff, specially their manager was horrible. I had to wait 20 mintues to check in when there was no one in the line! he refused to check me in eventhough I called him and asked if we can do early checked in and when I got there he said sorry I can't do it anymore. after 30 mintues he said, ok now lets check you in..... I didn't complain but was not satisfied.. i ignored... at 10pm I went to bed since I had an important Event the next day. Guess what? The noises from hallway and patio didn't let me sleep. some folks were on patio yelling and drunk until 12am. when I called downstairs, they said ok we will let them know. it didn't stop until 2 am in my 5th floor hallway. next morning when I asked the Same guy( he seems to be the manager same guy who checked me in)... he said well this is what you get in Ocean city? didn't you know this? we can't do anything... sorry but this is not our problem... so I was so unsatisfied... internet wasn't working at my room and when I asked him he said,,, well it works here it is not my issue! People, if you want customer Service DO NOT GO TO THIS HOTEL .....

Reviews.Title: “Decent location but far from nightlife”
Reviews.Author: MaKuMD
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for memorial day weekend. Got a great $79 deal so can't complain. Located about 6 miles from "downtown". One thing to know about OC for those not familiar with the city, there is a bus that runs up and down the coast (to the delaware border) every 15-30 minutes (depends on time of day) that costs only $1. At nights, its the drunk bus essentially (runs 24/7). Regarding the hotel, the rooms are clean, walls have OK insulation (could hear people if really loud, but not general conversation). Free internet, free parking, pool is indoors, but has a nice sundeck right next to it (weird set up). Next door to small strip mall with movie theater and OC kebab (great lebanese food). Walk to beach is about 500 feet. Friendly staff. Typical comfort inn.

Reviews.Title: “Uggh”
Reviews.Author: Erifish
Reviews.Content: I stayed here last summer'10. The hotel was at a good location. However the room smelled a little off. I didn't want to walk barefoot in the room and there was water dripping from the cealing when we woke up in the morning. The staff was not overly helpful. I don't need a posh hotel but cleanliness and helpfulness go a long way. This hotel did not have either. I would not stay here ever again!!

Reviews.Title: “Nice (Gem) Hotel at the Beach in Ocean City”
Reviews.Author: 4realguy
Reviews.Content: The hotel is in a good location across the street from the beach. It has fully been remodeled and is up to date. Flat screen in the room, marble counter in bathroom, microwave and refrigerator in all rooms. The rates are great for a hotel in this location, and in this case I think you get a little more than what you pay for. Indoor pool is nice, the jacuzzi isn't that great, but it is hot and has weak jets. The deck is pretty nice facing the bay and a beautiful way to watch the sun go down. The two prior reviews were on point and I would recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing”
Reviews.Author: shibbj
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for 2 nights during the summer and it was fantastic really close to the beach amazing pool, amazing view, clean rooms, nice jacuzzi tub. overall just a very nice stay at a decent price for the town! I recommend this hotel for sure!
